name: Caravan (itch)
description:
Caravan is in an unfinished state and will remain that way forever. 33,000 words of abandoned text!

Four people are on a pilgrimage to a faraway city. You've been asked to join them and tasked with a mission.

I wanted to touch on a lot of topics with this piece - the implicit assumptions we make about others and ourselves in the absence of information, the structure of subtle IF branching - but I'm not sure if any of that succeeded. The piece is currently a bit long for a Twine and lacks an ending. Just a heads up so you aren't frustrated down the line.
